byline.original: By SABRINA TAVERNISE and TIMOTHY WILLIAMS
byline.contributor: Sean Williams Walsh contributed reporting, and Alain Delaquérière contributed research.

abstract: Four mentally impaired adults are found behind steel door in small apartment building in Northeast Philadelphia, along with Social Security cards and documentation indicating that woman charged with their kidnapping, Linda Ann Weston, was stealing their Social Security disability checks.
snippet: The woman charged with kidnapping four mentally disabled people also had in her home the Social Security cards and other identity documents for about 50 people.
lead_paragraph: The woman charged with kidnapping four mentally disabled people also had in her home the Social Security cards and other identity documents for about 50 people.

headline.main: 4 People Are Found Held Captive in Basement
headline.print_headline: 4 People Are Found Held Captive In Basement
headline.seo: Four Mentally Disabled People Found Held in Basement
